title: US Open tennis 2025: Gauff advances, Sinner and Osaka in action on day seven – live
summary: Katy Murrells is providing updates on the third round of matches at Flushing Meadows. Stay tuned for live reports and developments as the tournament progresses. Check back for the latest scores and highlights.

title: USA v Australia: 2025 Women’s Rugby World Cup – live
summary: The Wallaroos face Ilona Maher and the Eagles in a crucial Group A match in York. Daniel Gallan provides minute-by-minute updates on the game. Stay tuned for live coverage and key moments.

title: Leeds 0-0 Newcastle: Premier League – live reaction
summary: Scott Murray provides a live, minute-by-minute report from Elland Road, offering updates on the ongoing events. The coverage includes key highlights and important moments as they unfold. Fans can follow along for real-time insights and commentary.

title: Chelsea make U-turn on Jackson’s Munich loan after Delap injury and land Garnacho
summary: Chelsea has decided not to move forward with Nicolas Jackson's loan to Bayern Munich following Liam Delap's hamstring injury sustained in a match against Fulham. This injury necessitates Jackson's continued presence in the squad. The club is adjusting its plans due to the unforeseen circumstances.

title: Ruben Amorim ‘loves’ his players again after their effort in Burnley win
summary: Ruben Amorim praised his team's effort despite their loss, while Scott Parker expressed frustration over the VAR decision that awarded Manchester United a controversial winning penalty. The remarks highlight differing views on officiating in the match. The incident sparked debate over the impact of VAR in football.
